casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

May 6, 2008

[Cite as 05/0612008 Case Announcements, 2008-0hio-2152.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2008-0757. Natl. Interstate Corp. v. West.

Summit App. No. 23877, 2008-0hio-1057. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and claimed appeal of right. Upon consideration of appellants’ motion for stay of the court of appeals’ judgment,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
